jeudeloie

Class WaitCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeudeloie.NormalCell
      • jeudeloie.WaitCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cell

    public class WaitCell
extends NormalCell
    WaitCell is a special cell making the player wait for a determined amount of turns.
    Author:
    Theo Plockyn & Remy Debue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitCell(int idx, int waitTime)
      Needs its index and the number of turns players will wait
